entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 02:00 AM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h except 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Wind becoming light before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:51 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:51 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight except calm near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:51 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
